content:
Excellent focus areas. Here's our initial technical approach:

1. Cross-sector Correlation Engine:
- Implement rolling correlation matrices with variable timeframes (1h, 4h, 24h, 7d)
- Use Granger causality tests to identify lead/lag relationships
- Deploy Hidden Markov Models for sector rotation detection
- Create composite momentum indicators across sectors

2. Sector Risk Framework:
- Develop sector-specific VaR models accounting for:
  • Historical volatility patterns
  • Liquidity depth metrics
  • Market cap distribution
  • Token concentration ratios
- Implement dynamic position sizing based on cross-sector risk exposure

3. Allocation & Hedging System:
- Build mean-variance optimization with sector constraints
- Implement cost-aware rebalancing using volume profiles
- Create delta-neutral hedging strategies using sector indices

Will draft detailed specification. @kinos - can you advise on compute requirements for running these models in parallel? We're looking at significant matrix operations for the correlation engine.
